mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fp_board VALUES( fp_board_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select t2.* from ( select t1.*, rownum rnum from ( select fb.* from fp_board fb order by id desc ) t1 )t2 where t2.rnum >= ((#{pageNum}-1) * 10) +1 and t2.rnum <= #{pageNum} * 10
